name: Vimity
tag_list: photographer, photograph, photo-shoot, photo, production-rentals, special-effects, commercials, production, model, makeup, styling, hair, wardrobe, catering, fashion, graphic-design, magazine, tv, visual-media, film, vimity
overview:
Vimity is an online community for the visual media industry. Members can mingle and expand their networks by connecting and communicating with industry professionals.

Members can show off their work by uploading videos and images to their profile and creating lightboxes. They can then be searched by others in the visual media industry including those looking for a professional to collaborate with.

Vimity also provides a private place for production staff to meet and collaborate on projects regardless of geographical location. Once a project is completed, it can be archived on Vimity in case it needs to be reviewed in the future.

There is also an industry specific classifies page for jobs, equipment, etc. where members can post ads or look for resources.
